newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Barbie and Ken fall in love in S.Africa.
newsitem.headline: Barbie and Ken fall in love in S.Africa.

text.p: Barbie and Ken, the world-famous dolls, have come alive and fallen in love in South Africa.
Penny Barge met Ken Dwayne Lumley when they landed part-time jobs as a real-life Barbie and Ken, who dress up in their trendiest outfits to help promote the American toy couple.

"The first I saw of Dwayne was his cowboy boots. Because I was so shy it took two weeks for me really to speak to him," said Barge. But over four years of working together they warmed to each other and say they are now more in love than the dolls they bring to life.

The radiant blond couple -- Ken in a bow tie gazing at Barbie in her pink sequined dress and pink lipstick in a sea of pink balloons -- were pictured in a weekly newspaper supplement entitled "You and Your Career".
